To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 (multipart/alternative) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sir/Madam, 
I'm writing on behalve of my boss, Carol Small with a complaint about
the 
page 'madtrot.com/17.html' hosted by your selves. I have made several 
attempts to talk with the administrator of the server (byohosting.com)
they 
have been less than helpful, basicly just telling me its being looked
into. 
There is nothing to be looked into. 
 
The sites content is placing my boss(s) potentially in direct harm by 
posting their Full Names, Addresses and car registration plates. As well
as 
being slanderous to our company. I'm requesting that the page is removed
as 
soon as possible. The server IP: 66.98.240.103. 
 
I thank you for your assistance in this matter and look forward to
hearing 
from you. 
--  
Anthony Shapley / Mr Mean
